name: bible-verse-search
title: Bible Verse Search
description: Quickly access and explore Bible verses directly from Raycast. Effortlessly search for any scripture reference, view the verse details, and copy verses to your clipboard—all without leaving your workflow. Enhance your study and inspiration with seamless Bible integration in Raycast.
author: josephtaylor-mn

commands.name: bible
commands.title: bible
commands.subtitle: Search for Bible Verses
commands.description: Quickly access and explore Bible verses directly from Raycast. Effortlessly search for any scripture reference, view the verse details, and copy verses to your clipboard—all without leaving your workflow. Enhance your study and inspiration with seamless Bible integration in Raycast.

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1
